channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ ACE FREHLEY ON LIFE SUPPORT FOLLOWING VERY SERIOUS FALL ☠⚡
item.description:
🤘⚡️WHOA, METALHEADS! ⚡️🤘
Looks like the Spaceman himself, the legendary Ace Frehley, just took a gnarly plunge that has him on LIFE SUPPORT! 😱🤘 It’s a serious bummer when one of the titans of rock hits the ground harder than a dropped power chord!
Get ready to grab your black nail polish and blast some KISS classics, ‘cause we’re sending ALL the positive vibes to Ace. This cosmic warrior has rocked stages from Hellfest to the far reaches of our wildest dreams! 🚀✨
Ace, we’re all in your corner like a mosh pit full of rabid fans! You’ve faced the darkness before, so don’t let this crash be the end, brother! Let’s hope he rallies back and KICKS OUT THE JAMS!
Join the chaos and raise your horns for the man who brought us the riffs that fuel our metal souls! 🤘🔥🔥 Keep your spirits high and your wallets open, because the crypto scene is rockin’, and we ain't backing down for anybody—especially not for a fall!
Stay metal, stay wild! 🖤⚡️
Let’s rally: Ace, we’re with YOU! #GetWellAce #MetalForever #CryptoChaos ⚡️🤘
🖤🤘💰 Stay tuned for more updates!
[Read the full steel spasm of this tragic tale over at MetalSucks!](https://www.metalsucks.net/2025/10/16/ace-frehley-on-life-support-following-very-serious-fall/)
#ThrashMetal #DeathMetal #MetalCommunity #Metal #MetalCulture
